channel.title: Quitting Smoking Podcast
channel.copyright: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons License - Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike - http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.0/
channel.description:
Quitting Smoking, they say one of the hardest things you will ever do.
Bullshit! Ever watch a woman give birth? Ever watch someone die from a smoking related illness?
This is a Place to come to be distracted for an hour or two from the hassles of the world and a place to hopefully learn that winning this battle is really possible.
If you listen please leave a review on what we have done here. It's important for us to know that what we are doing is on the mark or if there is something more that we can be doing. If you have any thoughts or ideas about upcoming shows we would love to hear them. Let us know.
**************************************************** Sorry for the delay in broadcasting. Tune in this Saturday for an update on what the hell has been going on in my life! This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com
channel.itunes:author: MrImax
channel.itunes:subtitle: Quitting Smoking Podcast

item.title: EPISODE81 - Addiction Recovery The Power Of Why!
item.author: smokingaintforsissies@hotmail.com
item.description:
Quitting Smoking is part of the addiction recovery process. It is a process that is possible when the why you want to quit is uncovered and then applied to your quit.
It is a beautiful thing, recovery, the ability to win the battle as opposed to letting the battle beat you. Go out and get your quit, it's there for the taking.

item.title: EPISODE79 - An Interview With Brat and it's not your typical brat
item.author: smokingaintforsissies@hotmail.com
item.description:
Looking to share the reality of Quitting Smoking and beating an addiction is possible with the world.
Too often as addicts we let the voices of the past control what happens to our future, today that stops and we take back control of our lives.

item.title: EPISODE63 - Funeral For A Friend
item.author: smokingaintforsissies@hotmail.com
item.description:
In life there are things that we so often take for granted, those simple phone calls to say hello, having lunch with a loved one for no reason, simply stopping by to see how someone is doing, and then there gone. Never able to be done again. Grasp those moments in your life with those you love because in a heartbeat they can be gone.
This episode is dedicated to a friend who lost some special the other day. Just know that you are in my thoughts.......

item.title: EPISODE12 - Stage 4 Cancer Patient Tells Their Story Of Life With Smoking..
item.author: smokingaintforsissies@hotmail.com
item.description:
An interview with a special guest. Jean a 55 year old woman and Stage 4 cancer patient has survived with this disease for longer then anyone I have known who has suffered with it.
Currently her health has declined to where she is on Oxygen 24 hours a day and under Hospice care ordered by her Doctors. And believe it or not she still smokes. Listen as she tells her story of her life with smoking.............
item.itunes:author: MrImax
item.itunes:subtitle: EPISODE12 - Stage 4 Cancer Patient Tells Their Story Of Life With Smoking..

item.title: EPISODE10 - An Interview With Pdogs
item.author: smokingaintforsissies@hotmail.com
item.description: A Candid discussion from the life of a cigarette smoker. There story and how they quit the demonic posession of the nicodemon. This weeks special guest is Pdogs Pat smoked for a long time and finally quit cold turkey after a visit to the hospital. She now has 4 1/2 years smoke free proving that first time quitters can be successful.
